export default function Home() {
  const [form, setForm] = useState<DeliveryForm>({
    cargos: [{ id: '1', length: 0, width: 0, height: 0, weight: 0 }],
    fromCity: '',
    toCity: '',
    fromAddress: '',
    toAddress: '',
    declaredValue: 0,
    needPackaging: false,
    needLoading: false,
    needCarry: false,
    floor: 1,
    hasFreightLift: false,
    needInsurance: false,
    fromTerminal: true,
    toTerminal: true,
    fromAddressDelivery: false,
    toAddressDelivery: false
  });
